QuanAggregator.mainSelect: SELECT A.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 A.cpod, --1 b.operando, --2 to_char(a.d_valido_dal,'yyyymmdd'), --3 to_char(a.d_valido_al,'yyyymmdd'), --4 b.valori, --5 b.prezzo, --6 c.id_operando , --7 nvl(d.consumo_cliente,0) --8 --campo menge FROM DBI_USER.IFC_SAP_ANAGRCONTRGAS A,gas_prodotto_operando b,z_anagrafica_operandi c, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_fornitura_gas_config D WHERE b.operando=c.operando and a.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR in (SELECT CNCON FROM z_test_contratti) and b.ctar1=a.ctar1 AND d.dbi_punto_key=A.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR AND C.TIPO='QUANT' group by A.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 A.cpod, --1 b.operando, --2 to_char(a.d_valido_dal,'yyyymmdd'), to_char(a.d_valido_al,'yyyymmdd'), --4 b.valori, --5 b.prezzo, --6 c.id_operando , --7 nvl(d.consumo_cliente,0) --8 --campo menge -- order by a.cncon

QuanExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 EMG_FACTS_QUANT.legacy, --4 EMG_FACTS_QUANT.tipo, --5 EMG_FACTS_QUANT.operand, --6 EMG_FACTS_QUANT.saison, --7 EMG_FACTS_QUANT.prog, --8 EMG_VALUE_QUANT.legacy, --9 EMG_VALUE_QUANT.tipo, --10 EMG_VALUE_QUANT.ab, --11 EMG_VALUE_QUANT.bis, --12 EMG_VALUE_QUANT.menge, --13 EMG_VALUE_QUANT.tarifart, --14 EMG_VALUE_QUANT.kondigr, --15 EMG_VALUE_QUANT.prog --16 from facts_key,EMG_FACTS_QUANT,EMG_VALUE_QUANT where facts_key.legacy = EMG_FACTS_QUANT.legacy and EMG_VALUE_QUANT.legacy=facts_key.legacy and EMG_FACTS_QUANT.legacy=EMG_VALUE_QUANT.legacy and EMG_FACTS_QUANT.prog=EMG_VALUE_QUANT.prog order by EMG_FACTS_QUANT.prog
